long_description: Built for dependable trail performance, the Scott Scale 970 29er hardtail mountain bike offers fast-rolling 29 in. wheels, 30 gears for any gradient and a shock-absorbent fork for any trail. Lightweight, butted aluminum frame is tuned to optimize efficiency in the climbs and remain responsive when descending. Suntour XCR RL-R suspension fork has 100mm of travel to make smooth work of choppy, rocky, root-covered trails; bar-top remote lockout lets you control suspension on the fly. Shimano Deore derailleurs and Deore shifters offer fast and reliable shifting performance across the 30 gears. Shimano BR-M395 hydraulic disc brakes provide easy, progressive braking with a 180mm rotor up front and a 160mm rotor in the back. Sturdy wheels are wrapped with the excellent all-arounder Schwalbe Rocket Ron tires to ensure great traction and fast-rolling performance on the trail. Full-length cable housing deters gunky buildup that saps shifting performance; replaceable rear derailleur hanger helps extend the frame's usable lifespan. Specs on the Scott Scale 970 29er hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
